name: ConnecTOUR
description:
Use the correct music and frequency to connect with the different aliens in this galaxy. Gather a following on your TOUR between stars

This was created for the Game Jam "Extra credits" with the Theme "Connect".

Instructions:

  • Aim - Mouse
  • Fire sound wave - Space / L.Ctrl
  • Change Frequency - Left / Right Mouse button
  • Change track - 1 , 2, 3 / Q, W, E

Tips:

  • Push your space craft with the sound waves to visit more planets
  • Different planets spawns different enemies
